SEARCH
Module Qilletni.qilletni.api.main
Package is.yarr.qilletni.api.lang.types

Interface FunctionType

All Superinterfaces:
AnyType, QilletniType
public non-sealed interface FunctionType extends AnyType
A Qilletni type representing a function (that has yet to be invoked yet).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    <T> T
    getBody()
    Gets the internal representation of the function's body that may be executed.

    Gets the number of parameters the function is defined with.

    The number of parameters the function accepts when it is being invoked.

    The name of the function.
    QilletniTypeClass<?>

    If this is an extension function, this returns the type that it is on.

    Gets the defined parameters of a function, including the first param if getOnType() is not null.

    If the function was defined outside of an entity.

    Checks if the function is defined natively.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      String getName()
      The name of the function.
      Returns:
      The name of the function

    • getParams

      String[] getParams()
      Gets the defined parameters of a function, including the first param if getOnType() is not null.
      Returns:
      The parameters of the function definition

    • getDefinedParamCount

      int getDefinedParamCount()
      Gets the number of parameters the function is defined with. If this is native, this includes the self param.
      Returns:
      The number of parameters defined with

    • getInvokingParamCount

      int getInvokingParamCount()
      The number of parameters the function accepts when it is being invoked. This is the size of getParams().
      Returns:
      The number of parameters that are accepted upon invocation

    • isNative

      boolean isNative()
      Checks if the function is defined natively.
      Returns:
      If this is a native function

    • isStatic

      boolean isStatic()
      Checks if the function is static that does not need to be invoked on an instance of something.
      Returns:
      If this is a static function

    • getOnType

      QilletniTypeClass<?> getOnType()
      If this is an extension function, this returns the type that it is on.
      Returns:
      The type this function is on, or null if none

    • isExternallyDefined

      boolean isExternallyDefined()
      If the function was defined outside of an entity. Used with getOnType(), this can tell if the function has the first instance parameter or not.
      Returns:
      If the function is defined outside of an entity

    • getBody

      <T> T getBody()
      Gets the internal representation of the function's body that may be executed. This should only be used internally.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the body
      Returns:
      The internal representation of the function
